titles.title: Telecommuting Tax Credit Act of 1994
To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to provide tax credits to businesses with employees performing services in their residences or in telecommuting centers.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR E285)
Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: 3/1/1994--Introduced. Telecommuting Tax Credit Act of 1994 - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to allow employers a tax credit for employees performing services in their residence or in a telecommuting center.
